list: Be available to meet in person every Friday during the semester from 1:00 PM to 4:00 PM
Attend monthly Board of Director meetings and Committees (2 to 3 times a month)
Attend Board Orientation (August prior to class starting) and monthly trainings (1 to 2x/month)
Serve on at least two assigned sub-committees
Meet weekly with the Executive Director
As an undergraduate member, you must maintain a 2.0 GPA each semester of each term
As a graduate member, you must maintain a 3.0 GPA each semester of each term
